introduction.name: Siddharth Jain.
introduction.title: I build scalable, robust backend systems.
introduction.description: I am a software engineering leader passionate about building data-driven backend solutions. Currently, I lead a team at !!The Options Clearing Corporation(https://theocc.com)!!, delivering cutting-edge microservices and data pipelines that significantly enhance system performance and reliability.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Back in 2013, I embarked on my journey in software engineering, diving deep into the world of coding and development at the University of Florida. Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had the privilege of architecting and leading software solutions for a leading !!nonprofit(https://prathambooks.org)!! , an innovative !!startup(https://www.uptake.com)!! , and a major !!financial corporation(https://theocc.com)!! .
about.paragraph2: My main focus these days is leading a team of engineers at The Options Clearing Corporation, where we design and deliver high-performance microservices and data pipelines that drive significant business impact. I thrive on solving complex problems at scale, creating robust and scalable backend solutions, and ensuring our systems are both reliable and efficient.
about.paragraph3: When I’m not immersed in code, I enjoy working on personal tech projects, mentoring upcoming developers, and volunteering with organizations that make a positive social impact. Outside of tech, I love exploring new places, reading, and spending quality time with friends and family.
about.paragraph4: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

work.title: Lead Software Engineer
points: !!Lead a team of 6 engineers!! to redesign and deliver a software solution, 3 months ahead of schedule and $200k under budget.
Architected and implemented data ingestion pipelines capable of processing and persisting 30,000 records/sec using Apache Flink, Kafka, PostgreSQL reducing processing times by 80%.

Designed and implemented the !!Core Netting Library!! used by multiple teams to calculate and re-access risk for defaulting clearing members using Java11, Generics, Java Streams API, Collections Framework
Implemented authentication for core microservices using OAuth2, Okta and Spring Security.
Designed and implemented several microservices for Real Time Clearing Platform using Java8, Spring Boot,Redis, Choreography and Event Driven Architecture patterns.
Designed and implemented the database migration tool and strategy using Flyway, PostgreSQL, EnterpriseDB.
Architected and developed highly scalable backend systems, ensuring reduced downtime, efficient resource utilization using Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Splunk, Rancher.
Displayed strong leadership by collaborating with stakeholders and product owners to define nonfunctional requirements, establish service level agreements, and set software testing standards.
Worked on extensively documenting onboarding processes, core libraries, and code templates, standardizing best coding practices for smooth adoption of new services.

work.title: Staff Software Developer
points: Led the design and development of multiple core libraries and components to standardize common software components like microservices, Restful API, security and exception handling code.

Enabled downstream application workflows by re-designing and implementing proprietary price smoothing engine to ingest and transform market data from vendors, capable of transforming 2 million records in ~5 minutes.
Developed Market Data vendor onboarding pipelines to make new vendor onboarding process 3x faster using Apache Flink, Spring Boot, Kafka, PostgreSql, Redis.
Designed and developed high performance Restful API's capable of serving ~2 million records over HTTP.
Collaborated on Designed and implemented core components of Integration Testing Suite using Citrus IT, to enable automated integration testing of software applications and data processing pipelines.

work.title: Senior Software Developer
points: Implemented multi-tenancy and authorization/authentication for core platform using Auth0, Spring Security, Spring Boot.
Mentored a team of 6 developers,to migrate core platform to scalable, high-volume, low latency microservices using Kanban Agile methodology.
Worked on development of highly concurrent, data-driven applications, constructing REST services using Java8, Kotlin and Kafka.
Developed core libraries to query ElasticSearch for data and aggregations, reducing overall redundancy and maximizing code reusability.

Developed and deployed dockerized applications using Docker, Jenkins CI/CD, Mesos/Marathon for continuous delivery of code, collecting application metrics and visualizing them using influxDB and Grafana.
Involved in rapid prototyping of several small applications using AngularJS, JavaScript, BootStrap, CSS and HTML5.
Developed tools and scripts using Groovy to migrate and re-index data on ElasticSearch.
Mentor as a Platform Engineer for a leading nonprofit for children in India, as a part of Uptake.org community.

Involved in rapid prototyping of several small applications using AngularJS, JavaScript, BootStrap, CSS and HTML5.

awards.award: The OCC Commitment to Excellence Award
awards.description: Awarded for taking lead on the Core Market Data Pipelines.
with a business idea to improve literacy using literature.
Biz Gyan Tree(Business Pitch) Programme Winner 2020 in Finance vertical for Best Business Plan, with seed funding of 10 million INR.
Graduate of the 2020 Jagriti Yatra entrepreneurship train journey, embodying a commitment to entrepreneurial excellence, innovation, and positive social impact.
Awarded too understand the problem in depth and solving it with unbridled commitment.
Winner of Uptake Hackathon Fall Edition 2015 and Fall Edition 2017.

projects.title: Mule
projects.description: An intelligent delivery system that enables students to be one another's deliverers - iOS and Android App

projects.title: UI Clones
projects.description: Cloning UIs of apps: Twitter, Spotify, Netflix, Instagram, Snapchat

projects.title: Astronutz
projects.description: Website for Astronutz - a collection of 10,000 nutty NFTs. Built using React + Chakra UI and hosted with Netlify

projects.title: Options Pricing
projects.description: Applying High Performance Computing techniques to compute the prices of American and European options using different pricing methods

projects.title: Principal Component Analysis
projects.description: Explore PCA to discern whether low-dimensional structure exists in a set of data and to find good representations of the data in that subspace

projects.title: K-means Clustering
projects.description: Implementing the k-means++ algorithm using it to cluster Iris dataset from the UCI Machine Learning Repository

projects.title: Non-Linear Classifiers
projects.description: Experiment with non-linear classifiers: Boosted Decision Trees (i.e., boosting with decision trees as weak learner) and Random Forests

projects.title: Linear Regression
projects.description: A simple linear regression model with a modified loss function and try to solve it with Gradient Descant (GD) and Stochastic Gradient Descant (SGD)

projects.title: K-NN Algorithm
projects.description: Use the k-NN algorithm to find the optimal value for the number of neighbors k, using the implementation in scikit-learn

projects.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
projects.description: Basic data analysis on a simple data set (UCI Adult data set) using pandas package in Python

footer.lineThree: And love solving complex problems with code.
